game.name: nKaruga
game.desc: nKaruga is a demake of the popular bullet heck game Ikaruga, released in 2002 for Dreamcast and 2003 for Gamecube. Ikaruga is a vertical shoot ’em up that features an unique polarity-switching gameplay. Switch the ship’s polarity and “get hit and absorb” enemy bullets! Achieve High Score with the chain bonus! nKaruga originated on the TI-Nspire calculator series as a C++ game by developer matrefeytontias. The PC version can be found at gamejolt.
